channel.title: [Camp Ochre Jelly] Ashen Stars: Rogues' Galaxy: A Galaxy to Burn (One Shot)
channel.description:
![harris|637x367](upload://iiw2VuoUSLEoMmH6QTZQlSd9z3e.jpeg) **This is a practice game for Camp Ochre Jelly.**
Times are hard for a crew of criminals in today's galaxy. The Bleed is on the brink of war: The Combine has been building up its naval fleet to bring that anarchic area under its heel once and for all, while the Rebels are making a propaganda push for hearts and minds. All this has caused business in the underworlds to dry up. But maybe there's a way to turn this saber-rattling in your favor?
**Ashen Stars: Rogues' Galaxy** is an investigative game where you play a crew of criminals in deep space, discovering dirty secrets and unraveling mysteries. It is set in the far future, in a wide outer area of the galaxy called the Bleed, imperfectly patrolled by a multi-civilization cartel called the Combine.
**CW: Violence, violence against law enforcement, profanity, revolution, poverty, crime.**
**System** : Ashen Stars by Robin D. Laws and published by Pelgrane Press (GUMSHOE Engine, Warp Play rules, Rogues' Galaxy hack)
**Duration** : One 4 hour session
**Breaks** : 3 breaks per session (5-10 mins)
**Venue** : GM's Zoom
**Recording** : Yes, with permission before and after
**Attendance** : Open door policy
**Safety** : [The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and safety tools (Lines, Veils, Script Change and X-Card) will be in use.
Game image by: John Harris
